downloadTitle: Forefront Unified Access Gateway (UAG) Content Series - SharePoint Publishing Solution Guide
downloadDescription: Forefront UAG Content Series - SharePoint Publishing Solution Guide
detailsSection: You can use Forefront UAG to provides remote access to Microsoft SharePoint applications. This solution guide provides an overview of SharePoint publishing, a summary of the advantages of publishing SharePoint via Forefront UAG; planning information; and detailed deployment steps. It is also available online at the Forefront UAG TechCenter (http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd861393.aspx).
installInstructionSection:
• To start the download, click the Download button, and then do one of the following:
    • To start the download immediately, click Open.
    • To copy the download to your computer for viewing at a later time, click Save.
    • To cancel the download, click Cancel.
